Bradley n 1: United States politician who was elected the first Black may of Los Angeles (1917-1998) [syn: {Thomas Bradley}, {Tom Bradley}] 2: United States general who played an important role in the Allied victory in World War II (1893-1981) [syn: {Omar Bradley}, {Omar Nelson Bradley}]
